languages.text: {n}Героическими усилиями техночистильщиков мануфакторум сектор за сектором был очищен от заразы. Пораженные машины и тела погибших предали священному плазменному огню.{/n}
{n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Героическими усилиями техночистильщиков мануфакторум сектор за сектором был очищен от заразы. Пораженные машины и тела погибших предали священному плазменному огню.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Sweeper, the manufactorum had been purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and the dead bodies have been set on sacred plasma fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在技术净化者的英勇努力下，制造工厂各个区域的疫病都被清除。受影响的机器与尸体在神圣的等离子烈焰中熊熊燃烧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在技术净化者的英勇努力下，制造工厂各个区域的疫病都被清除。受影响的机器与尸体在神圣的等离子烈焰中熊熊燃烧。{/n}
{n}在技术净化者的英勇努力下，制造工厂各个区域的疫病都被清除。受影响的机器与尸体在神圣的等离子烈焰中熊熊燃烧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gracias a los heroicos esfuerzos de los tecnopurgadores, el manufactorum está libre de la enfermedad, sector por sector. Las máquinas afectadas y los cadáveres se entregaron a las llamas del plasma sagrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gracias a los heroicos esfuerzos de los tecnopurgadores, el manufactorum está libre de la enfermedad, sector por sector. Las máquinas afectadas y los cadáveres se entregaron a las llamas del plasma sagrado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}技術断罪者の英雄的な努力が実り、聖工場はセクターごとに病気が清められていった。影響を受けた機械や遺体は神聖なプラズマで焼却された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}技術断罪者の英雄的な努力が実り、聖工場はセクターごとに病気が清められていった。影響を受けた機械や遺体は神聖なプラズマで焼却された。{/n}
{n}技術断罪者の英雄的な努力が実り、聖工場はセクターごとに病気が清められていった。影響を受けた機械や遺体は神聖なプラズマで焼却された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Grâce aux efforts héroïques des technopurificateurs, le manufactorum est purgé de la maladie secteur après secteur. Les machines et les cadavres infectés sont confiés à un flot de plasma sacré.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Grâce aux efforts héroïques des technopurificateurs, le manufactorum est purgé de la maladie secteur après secteur. Les machines et les cadavres infectés sont confiés à un flot de plasma sacré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Durch die heldenhaften Bemühungen der Tech-Purgatoren konnte das Manufactorum von der Krankheit gereinigt werden, Sektor für Sektor. Die betroffenen Maschinen und Leichen wurden den heiligen Plasmaflammen überantwortet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Durch die heldenhaften Bemühungen der Tech-Purgatoren konnte das Manufactorum von der Krankheit gereinigt werden, Sektor für Sektor. Die betroffenen Maschinen und Leichen wurden den heiligen Plasmaflammen überantwortet.{/n}

{n}Durch die heldenhaften Bemühungen der Tech-Purgatoren konnte das Manufactorum von der Krankheit geläutert werden, Sektor für Sektor. Die betroffenen Maschinen und Leichen wurden durch heiliges Plasma entzündet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tekno Tasfiye mangalarının sektörden sektöre koşarak sarf ettiği kahramanca çabalar sayesinde manufaktorum, hastalıktan arındırıldı. Etkilenen makineler ve cesetlerse kutsal plazma ateşine atıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}By the heroic efforts of the Tech-Purgators, the manufactorum was purged of the disease, sector by sector. The affected machines and dead bodies were consigned to the sacred plasma flames.{/n}
